lines.Vitus: "I want to talk to Krokos and see what he thinks about being summoned."

lines.Volesus: "It'll be interesting, just as long as he's not too bothered by us interrupting him."

lines.Krokos: "And what do you need of me now?"
"Oh?"
"You two are up to something."
"So what made you summon a man like me to a place like this, then?"
"Just to relax?"
"Then allow me rise to the occasion."

lines: (The snow leopard turned a corner and we heard some soft rustling.)

lines.Krokos: "There we are."
"So what manner of method will we go about to relax then?"

lines.Vitus: "We wanted to ask you a few questions."

lines.Krokos: "I don't mind divulging a few secrets for a couple of curious minds."

lines.Vitus: "We want to know what it's like to be summoned."

lines.Krokos: "Well that's not difficult to answer."
"It's like walking from one waking dream to another."
"One moment I'm somewhere, another moment I'm elsewhere."
"But I always know that I've been called when I arrive."

lines.Volesus: "We meant more along the lines of how you feel about getting summoned."

lines.Krokos: "Well that's far less interesting."
"I finish what needs to be done and then get back to my studies. Feelings play little part in it."
"I feel grateful that I have earned the honour of being summoned."
"I feel a sense of fulfilled duty knowing that there will always be something new to learn and teach."
"And also that I have an avenue to do that forever."
"So how could I feel anything other than pride from such an opportunity, even if it means that I have to indulfe in trivial matters from time to time."
"Well sure."
"I experience a broad range of emotions, like you."
"Unlike you, I've just had a very long time to control them."

lines.Vitus: "It makes me wonder what you're feeling right now."

lines.Krokos: "Plenty. I assure you."

lines.Vitus: "So long as you let us know what those feelings are sometimes."

lines.Volesus: "...And when all relevant parties are present I would hope."
